item.title: how bezos' phone was hacked
item.description: Good summary from the New York Times on How Bezos Phone Was Hacked, the article clearly states that the phone used by Bezos was an iphone X. The end statement of the article is so true 😔 “It basically means that we are all extremely vulnerable” - Agnes Callamard

item.title: recovering
item.description: Health Last saturday got my second b12 shot, and had long week in MX due Revolution Day (México) which I used to take some rest and recover. I am feeling better than last week. I can’t wait to go back to biking again. Con salud todo, sin ella nada. :-/

item.title: blogging as therapy
item.description: work Kubecon San Diego starts this week, we are excited to show a demo: The Future is Serverless AI See a doodle come to life as a picture with full details delivered by Deep Learning Reference Stack in a serverless function-as-a-service way both in cloud and edge.
